Observations: Analyzing The Data:
    1. Top Performing Schools are All Charter while Bottom Performing Schools are all district.
    2. Average_Math Scores and Average_Reading Scores stays consitent across all grades within all schools.
    3. Lower Score averages showing more with higher spending ranges. Higher spending budget schools are showing lower            performanace and that's true for all bottom performing schools.
    4. Smaller Capacity Schools are showing higher performance across reading and math Scores
    5. Dirstrict Schools are performaing worse than Charter Schools acorss Spending budget and Size.
